entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Thompson
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:43 p.m. CDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning early this evening then changing to light snow overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the evening then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
